File Format:
.3ds .3dsx .app .axf cci .cxi .elf
.cia is incompatible with EmulationStation-DE and Steam ROM Manager
.cia can only be used if installed and played through Citra's GUI

BIOS Files: FDS (Famicom Disk System) games require a BIOS:  `disksys.rom` in `Emulation/bios`
FDS (Famicom Disk System) games require a BIOS:  `disksys.rom` in `Emulation/bios`

∙ Place `prod.keys` in: `Emulation/bios/ryujinx/keys`
∙ Install firmware through Ryujinx GUI
∙ **Both** firmware and keys are **required** for Ryujinx
